abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed amendment to the Credit
            Agreement regarding Azerbaijan Highway Project intends to
            utilize project savings of US$ 15 to 16 million (about 30
            percent of the credit amount), to construct a bypass around
            the city of Tovuz in western Azerbaijan. The bypass would
            include a 14-kilometer-long highway, located along the
            existing Ganja-Gazah road, and a bridge over the Tovuz River
            on the eastern side of Tovuz. The proposed modifications to
            the Credit Agreement comply with the Articles of Agreement,
            and it is thus recommended to approve the proposed amendment
            in accordance with the terms set herewith.
